import React, { Component } from "react"; export default class AddTask extends Component { state={ task: { name: "", owner: "", priority: "", category: "", submitDate: new Date(), deadline: new Date(), done: false } } submitAdd = () => { let currentState = this.state.task currentState.submitDate = new Date () currentState.done = false this.setState({task : currentState}) console.log(this.state.task) } taskOnChange = event => { let currentState = this.state.task currentState.name = event.target.value this.setState({task : currentState}) } respOnChange = event => { let currentState = this.state.task currentState.owner = event.target.value this.setState({task : currentState}) } priorityOnChange = event => { let currentState = this.state.task currentState.priority = event.target.value this.setState({task : currentState}) } CategoryOnChange = event => { let currentState = this.state.task currentState.category = event.target.value this.setState({task : currentState}) } deadlineOnChange = event => { let currentState = this.state.task currentState.deadline = new Date(event.target.value) this.setState({task : currentState}) } cancelAdd = () => this.props.cancelAdd() render() { return (

Add Task



); } }
